author: oheger
msg: CONFIGURATION-273: Added a new method interpolatedConfiguration() to AbstractConfiguration, which returns a configuration with all variables substituted by their actual values; tests for interpolation have been refactored into a special test class, so that they can easily be applied to other Configuration implementations.

msg: Improvement on TOMAHAWK-1065 - Freemarker dependency made explicitly compile-time.
